title: rollcat_io
author: rollcat_io
content: Hello, Bitcointalk community!We are thrilled to present our new gaming platform - RollCat.Key Features:‚ú® Dynamic Spinning Wheel: Place your bets on numbers ranging from 1Ô∏è‚É£ to 4Ô∏è‚É£0Ô∏è‚É£. What sets us apart are our 2Ô∏è‚É£x and 7Ô∏è‚É£x bonus spin multipliers. These multipliers stack, offering you the opportunity for massive rewards.‚ùáÔ∏è Free Hourly Coins: Claim free coins every hour, allowing you to play and enjoy our games without having to invest your own money.‚öñÔ∏è Transparency and Fairness: We utilize provably fair technology, ensuring that every game result can be independently verified. Play with confidence, knowing that the outcomes are random and untampered with. Our seeding event can be found here.‚ö° Wide Range of Cryptocurrencies: We accept a variety of cryptocurrencies, including BTC, ETH, LTC, BCH, BNB, SOL, USDT, USDC, BUSD, DOGE, and TRX.Please share your thoughts and ideas by commenting below. üôè‚Ä®‚Ä®URL: https://rollcat.io

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.What do you mean by multipliers stack? if nobody get the 2x or 7x then it will increase in the next round?I was going around your Help section and it's nice that you are upfront with your betting limit and maximum win. You probably designed that according to your current bankroll but do you plan on adjusting that if the casino grows in the future?

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.Nice domain name!Instead of posting plain texts, consider having a nice design. That's getting more engagement here from my experiences.Consider buying copper membership so you can post images. You can't post images with newbie rank.If you are considering promotional campaigns here, feel free to reach out me as I have experiences running signature campaigns and other promo campaigns for casinos.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: rollcat_io link=topic=5457525badlammsg62458730#msg62458730 date=1687694637Please share your thoughts and ideas by commenting below. üôè‚Ä®‚Ä®URL: https://rollcat.iois it possible that RollCat.io, only provides a spinning wheel game, without other games, no other games, actually a good wheel game, that type of game has a high probability of winning. You explain well here how to play, it's good for beginners.QuoteSimply bet on the number you think the wheel will stop at: 1, 2, 5, 10, 20 or 40. If you bet on the correct number you will win a corresponding payout (e.g. 1 to 1, 2 to 1, 5 to 1, and so on).Maybe we will see the experience for wheel game fans on your platform, are you fair or vice versa, generally what users want to ask is generally difficult to answer,¬† for all that in the help center, whatever the story, for sure the games on the RollCat.io site, made a lot of curious people want to bet there, good luck here for RollCat.io and their users, I will try one day.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Welcome to the forum! I see this as very fresh site with a few players based on the stats but it looks promising as it focuses in one game as of the moment. I suggest to have a good marketing team to handle this project and have some promotions as well, this can be a big help to attract investors and the players too. Looking forward for your more exposure here in the forum.

comments.author: so98nn
comments.body: I was about to get lucky but I just went on your site to check what you have to offer. Just in front of me the wheel rolled 7x twice. What surprised me is the next number that wheel rolled was 245x. That‚Äôs freaking High multiplier man and how is it possible if there is simply no range for that number? Is it something related to so called multiplier stack as mentioned in the OP or it‚Äôs just for the demo purpose?I hope not because I clicked original URL which shall take me to the live site no matter if I‚Äôm logged in or out. As far as site is concern, UI seems simple and easy to understand. As we can see you seem to have only one game so far. Hope to see some answers and more real vouches from the users. Good luck.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.created_time: June 25, 2023, 01:43:24 PMLast edit: June 25, 2023, 05:06:02 PM by AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on June 25, 2023, 12:26:42 PMWhat do you mean by multipliers stack? if nobody get the 2x or 7x then it will increase in the next round?Nope, Multiiplier has a separate slot on the wheel which means the total choices on the wheel is 42 slot( 40 numbers plus 2 multiplier slot) approximately 52. It‚Äôs same mechanism on Crazy time and Dream Catcher which your multiplier adds up when you keep hitting that same multiplier spot.You can a have a better overview if you will notice the wheel appearance.

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: Copper membership helps Newbies to enable images with small fees.With good designs, you will have a better announcement thread that will be displayed if you have a Copper membership.Overview of Bitcointalk Designers(Signature,Avatar,etc)If you want to have more choices for your casino avatar, you can run avatar contest.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: rollcat_io on June 25, 2023, 12:03:57 PMMaybe i am missing a point, but why would anyone want to bet 1x bets? How is the gambler benefiting from that?Simplified fauced without unnecessary hard CAPTHA is a nice touch. I like other simplfied design as well. It took me a while to find the hashes as i thought you would advertise it being provably fair and they would be easier to find, but after finding them, placing them under small bet icons seems to be sensible for minimalistic intuitive interface.Sadly i don't like the only game you provide, if you add more with minimalistic style, like crash and maybe some card games i will come back.

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: I am still confused about how this platform works. Then we have the UX/UI design which I feel is confusing. Don't you need to put in a tour video for someone like me who is new to gambling? As you have a single game you need to have an introduction that makes the understanding of a new gambler easy. What I felt is that this platform assumes that everyone is into online gambling. Otherwise, they would have made a simple to use interface.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on June 25, 2023, 02:03:37 PMQuote from: rollcat_io on June 25, 2023, 12:03:57 PMMaybe i am missing a point, but why would anyone want to bet 1x bets? How is the gambler benefiting from that?Simplified fauced without unnecessary hard CAPTHA is a nice touch. I like other simplfied design as well. It took me a while to find the hashes as i thought you would advertise it being provably fair and they would be easier to find, but after finding them, placing them under small bet icons seems to be sensible for minimalistic intuitive interface.Sadly i don't like the only game you provide, if you add more with minimalistic style, like crash and maybe some card games i will come back.You are really missing something here. On roulette game like this means multiplier of your profit. A X1 will give you 1:1 pay so if you bet 1$ then you will be paid 1$ aside from your original bet that will bring you 2$ in total same with x2 that will give you 2$ profit and 3$ total money including your original bet.This is how roulette works with multiple multiplier available. They multiply the profit in contrary to the typical multiplier like dice that multiply the base bet.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, I've signed up and played a few hands with the faucet provided by Rollcat. In general your site isn't difficult to understand, especially since there is only 1 game currently on it. Multipliers stack is also very interesting, I have never come across this system in any crypto casino. one question about multipliers stack, as i understand so far, we'll get the highest multiplier i.e. 280 if we are at 40 after getting x7 multiplier right? then is it possible for players to get x7 multiplier in a row for the second time? so the highest multiplier will be x1960?

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: OP, get a copper membership as advised by Little Mouse. This will enable you post quality designs and it will add more value to the advert of your casino. I see that the site is easily to access but your try and add more games so that customers can play games of their choice,if you want your casino to make more profit. You are in the best place for your business. Welcome to the forum.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk.org, I guess others have already suggested that you should purchase copper membership so that you can be able to post image in this as the minimum rank required to post image is jr member. Do that and make your thread more presentable.I was about to write about creating a token that allows users to test the site before I saw the faucet, that pretty much does the funciton of the inbuilt token so kudos to you for that, I have tried it just once and I do have a sugggestion for the fauce: Could you implement a timer into your faucet? so that users can be aware of the exact time when to come back and claim their next faucet, I have seen it in other faucet and it's very nice.I have gone through everything in your website and as such I don't have anymore suggestion to add, but I'm sure I'll be revisiting your site for proper analysis, good luck OP.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: the appearance of your site is quite attractive, it seems it is still in the development stage, does your development team plan to add more features in the future?

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. Personally, I am not super convinced by the design, it doesn't really look so attractive in my eyes. The wheel you have can be interesting and you stand out with the multipliers you offer. Open question: will it be enough to convince enough people as several casinos have something that is pretty similar and this is for the moment the only game you offer?

comments.author: leonair
comments.body: Welcome to this forum.¬† You must know that people like beauty a lot so I suggest you to first open a beautiful and attractive announcement thread where some beautiful and qualityfull images will be displayed with all important information. But since your account is newbies, the image will not be displayed, which is why you need to purchase an additional membership first like copper member. And then you can make a full announcement through your account. Apart from this, many facilities will be provided for you such as signature code option where you can add a signature of your choice which will be displayed wherever you post. And on the other hand to promote your casino site well on this forum you can organize a signature campaign under a trusted manager which will advertise your site more better way.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk forum!I tried opening RollCat website but nothing is opening on my side in Brave browser and it always spins with RollCat logo circle.Even after disabling Shields in settings website was not loading so I had to try with different software.Maybe it is something connected with Brave because it opens fine on different browsers like firefox.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: The project is looking good, you only need the right bankroll to run it and the gambling license. Is that license in process or you will simply skip it. The problem with running without a license is that you can close the site and walk away with the money at any moment and the users will not know who to blame in that scenario, that's why a gambling license is important to build trust in the gambling industry.And do you have any plans of adding more games in the future? it would be nice to see games like dice or plinko.

comments.author: Hamphser
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on June 25, 2023, 07:36:31 PMThe project is looking good, you only need the right bankroll to run it and the gambling license. Is that license in process or you will simply skip it. The problem with running without a license is that you can close the site and walk away with the money at any moment and the users will not know who to blame in that scenario, that's why a gambling license is important to build trust in the gambling industry.And do you have any plans of adding more games in the future? it would be nice to see games like dice or plinko.Agree to this on which people would really be that keen when it comes to licensing on¬† which if a certain site doesnt have then it would really be building up that kind of hesitance or confidence on dealing or playingwith the site compared into those platforms which does have their license.We aren't saying that they would really be running or something that we could really be that conclusive but we cant really be removed intoour minds about those probabilities.Welcome into this forum RollCat.io!Checked out the site and its not really that looking bad and i've seen that there's only 2 people online which is understandable. Seeing out that you dont have much when it comes to bankrolland trying out to build it up over time.Do you have plans or budget allocated for marketing? This is something that crucial or something that would really be giving out exposure on any business.
